background: This protocol was developed to describe methods for evaluating the re-introduction of Chinook salmon to Lookingglass Creek and is also used for determining effects of habitat actions on abundance of natural-origin spring Chinook salmon in the Upper Grande Ronde River Subbasin.
title: Spring Chinook salmon redd surveys for Lookingglass Creek
assumptions: All redds constructed in the selected reaches are counted. Each redd is counted once and only once. Accurate redd/female factor is used. GPS coordinates are accurate.
objectives: Estimate the number of spawning females.
Estimate the numbers of natural-origin spring Chinook salmon spawners over time.
